title: Posh mushrooms with garlic and parsley on toast
description: Mushrooms on toast is a great favourite of mine. If wild garlic is out of season you can use sorrel or spinach instead.
ingredients: 400g/14oz seasonal mushrooms (such as St George’s, wild or button mushrooms), larger mushrooms halved
½ bunch chives, chopped (or one spring onion, finely chopped)
100g/3½oz parmesan (or a similar vegetarian hard cheese), grated
